segments.text: are you looking for a course ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: yes , but I'm not sure which one to sign up for .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: what kind of program are you looking for ? Full-time or part-time ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I have to work during the day , so I want to find a part-time course that I can do in the evenings .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: what kind of course are you looking for ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I need to improve my English .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: do you want a one-to-one private tutor or a group class ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think a one-to-one course will be too expensive for me , so a group class would be fine .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: have you ever considered taking one of our online courses ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think I prefer face-to-face instruction better .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: that's fine . If you want , you can sign up for a pre-sessional interview .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: one of our qualified teachers will interview you so that they can find a class that suits you best .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: do you have a brochure about the course that I can take home to read ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: sure . Here's a brochure about out English classes that meet in the evenings .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: thanks . I'll read through it tonight and get back to you tomorrow to sign up for a course .
segments.speaker: S2
